title: Workshop Introduction

Life from biology to ecology.

Complex system encompasses large number of issues which are very transversal to all human life.
And also critical infrastructure in our opinion should be part of this huge recipe recipe of all the complex systems.

So I will start with the definition of conflating infrastructure which has been given a few time ago from by voltage meets a critical infrastructure is a large scale infrastructure which is if the graded, disrupted or destroyed would have a serious impact on health, safety, security or well being of citizens.
Or the effective functioning of government, government and economy.
So this is a quite comprehensive definition of complex infrastructure that we may retain as a starting point for our discussion.
Of course we have a large number of examples of critical infrastructure transmission and distribution network pipeline for oil and gas transport.
Roads, motorways, network for water supply, communication etc.
So we have and of course we can add the.
Other other issues which are less technological are more related, so the organizational part of human active.

Complex systems.
In fact they contain a lot of issues and emergency of phenomena which are typical of complex systems and can be probably tackled with a complex system methodology's.
Of course there is also a technological relevance, sorry.
Be cause this the application of new methodology is motivated by from other domain can of course allowed to increase up to update the control technology of this infrastructure.
Most of those CIS are grown during the last last years and now are oversized over probably overloaded.

This emerging phenomena which are occurring more and more often.
In the in the critical infrastructure, of course there are also new paradigm.

Uh, need to reconsider all the control systems for electrical grids, and then of course the issue of protection which so we want to increase the resilience allowed to system to sell, feel, etc.
So I mean, there are a lot of issues, technological issues which may be tackled with the at least starting from complex systems idea.
And then of course the huge problem of interdependencies.
Complex infrastructure are nowadays not single stuff, but well entangled systems and so also in this case complex system methodology is an idea.
May help us in understanding an in deciphering this interdependency, and also in helping us in modeling those those.

Publishing of this special issues to send me as soon as possible the their full paper.
